content.p: View Nottingham in a larger map Nottingham is centred in the heart of the United Kingdom, its location in the East Midlands provides easy access to numerous transport links. The University of Nottingham is within easy reach of several of the country's largest airports: Nottingham is easily accessible from the M1 motorway, Nottingham Train Station has direct lines to most major cities in the UK and there is a very comprehensive bus and tram service for Nottingham and the surrounding areas. Once you've arrived in Nottingham, our campuses are easy to locate with quick and convenient public transport links. University Park Campus Jubilee Campus King's Meadow Campus Sutton Bonington Campus City Hospital Royal Derby Hospital Queen's Medical Centre
